name: maliciosa-reservoir
description: The ascent to the maliciosa reservoir is a track with steep slopes that do not give a break in the first 50 minutes, then, at the foot of the reservoir, it is possible to choose to return by the same path or take a detour to return through the Almorchones and the Angostura stream.
descriptionShort: The ascent to the maliciosa reservoir is a track with steep slopes that do not give a break in the first 50 minutes.

steps.name: Vista Real
steps.description: From the entrance of the urbanization take the main street to the end. To the right is a gate that provides access to the track. From there, there is no possible loss.
additionalData: After a few turns it is possible to cool off for a moment at the Peña Colmena fountain, at the left of the track, from where we can see the entire valley
Although at first the slope is gentle, it is advisable to take a moderate and continuous step so as not to get tired before time
The water at Peña Colmena is drinkable

steps.name: The reservoir
steps.description: Take the detour to the right to reach the reservoir. After crossing it, it is possible to continue towards La Maliciosa, take a detour through the Los Almorchones valley and return via the Angostura stream, or return along the same path.
additionalData: It is advisable to respect the indications in the reservoir

The return through the valley of the Almorchones and Peña Jardinera stream is undoubtedly the most recommended, there is a fountain along the way to cool off and even a small dam where many people go up to bathe in summer

comments.author: berli@hotmail.com
comments.text: We started the day making the ascent and spend a few hours in the Los Almorchones valley, a lovely place
